name: SC1 Enslavers and DarkVengeance Remake
description:
This is a remake map of Enslavers and Dark Vengeance campaign from Starcraft 1.

\- The map has been updated with the latest mod by [Starcraft Mass Recall Team](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/starcraft-mass-recall/>)

Download

[Enslavers & Dark Vengeance](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/enslavers/files/11-enslavers-and-dark-vengeance-remake/>)

And complete Russian version of Enslavers series by **timmaxshift**

[Enslavers & Dark Vengeance (Russian)](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/enslavers/files/2368518>)

how to play

1\. Extract map and mod files. (Download the latest mod file from [Here](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/starcraft-mass-recall/files/>) \- SCMRmod)

2\. Paste mod file to 'Mods' folder in Starcraft 2 directory.

3\. Test document maps or just simply drag them on starcraft 2.exe icon.

Play order

Enslavers

1 -> 2 -> (You have destroyed the cerebrate) 3a

1 -> 2 -> (You have rescued Protoss) 2b -> 3b

Dark Vengeance

1 -> 2 -> 3 -> (You have recovered Khadarin crystal in mission 03) 4a -> 5a

1 -> 2 -> 3 -> (You have destroyed Command centers in mission 03) 4b -> 5b
author: _ForgeUser26183264
